wrath.client.events

Interface InputEventHandler


  • public interface InputEventHandler
    Interface to handle general InputManager events. To be implemented by the game developer to receive events.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onCharInput(char c)
      Method that is called when a key is pressed.
      void onCursorMove(double x, double y)
      Method that is called when the cursor is moved.
      void onScroll(double xoffset, double yoffset)
      Method that is called when the mouse scroll wheel is moved.

    • Method Detail

      • onCharInput

        void onCharInput(char c)
        Method that is called when a key is pressed. Used primarily for text-chat purposes.
        Parameters:
        c - The character that was entered.

      • onCursorMove

        void onCursorMove(double x,
                  double y)
        Method that is called when the cursor is moved.
        Parameters:
        x - The new X coordinate that the cursor is located.
        y - The new Y coordinate that the cursor is located.

      • onScroll

        void onScroll(double xoffset,
              double yoffset)
        Method that is called when the mouse scroll wheel is moved.
        Parameters:
        xoffset - Left to Right movement. Most mouses will not support this movement.
        yoffset - Standard up and down scroll wheel movement. 1.0 is one unit upwards, -1.0 is one unit downwards.
